    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        The start process of model: 1 -exports the server stub 2 -send receive game message to every player

      • stop

        public void stop()
        The stop model process that un-exports server stub

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(IPlayer player,
                      IChatServer toRemove)
        set player stub to replace original chatserver
        Parameters:
        player - the stub of player
        toRemove - the player's original chatserver

      • sendText

        public void sendText(IPlayer sender,
                     java.lang.String text)
        Forwarding text message after receive text message from a player
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender of this message
        text - the content of message

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame()
        called by the adapter from Server to model to notify stopping game. And then send stop game message to every player participated in this game

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method is called by the adapter from Server to model when server receives the start game message from player. 1 -initialize points of random latitude and longitude and some of which have scores not equal to zero. 2 -send start game message to every player with the time of game round and set of points synchronously 3 -start the timer

      • getCmd

        public AOurDataPacketAlgoCmd<?,IChatServer> getCmd(java.lang.Class<?> reqClassIdx)
        This method is called by the adapter from Server to model when server receives new command request message
        Parameters:
        reqClassIdx - the type of message
        Returns:
        the command to process the message

      • getStub

        public IChatServer getStub()
        This method is called by the adapter from Server to model when server sends player receive game message to pass the server stub to player
        Returns:
        the stub of server

      • pointScore

        public void pointScore(APoint p,
                       java.util.UUID id)
        This method is called by the adapter from Server to model when server receives Point Score Message. 1 -change the score of the team who chose the point 2 -mark the point as selected 3 -remove the point from score point set 4 -send Point Score Message to all players to mark the point on map.
        Parameters:
        p - the point that was selected
        id - the id of the team who chose this point

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(IPlayer sender)
        This method is called by the adapter from Server to model when server receives player's leaving message. Removes the player from its team
        Parameters:
        sender - the player who is leaving
